markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Advanced Muse's Whispers](/Feats.aspx?ID=5060) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 216 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Archetype** [Bard](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=211)

**Prerequisites**
[Basic Muse's Whispers](/Feats.aspx?ID=5059)

</column>

---

You gain one bard feat. For the purpose of meeting its prerequisites, your bard level is equal to half your character level.

**Special** You can select this feat more than once. Each time you select it, you gain another bard feat.
name: Advanced Muse's Whispers
